title: EntropyStop: Unsupervised Deep Outlier Detection with Loss Entropy
details: Y Huang, Y Zhang, L Wang, F Zhang, X Lin - arXiv preprint arXiv:2405.12502, 2024
abstract: Unsupervised Outlier Detection (UOD) is an important data mining task. With the advance of deep learning, deep Outlier Detection (OD) has received broad interest. Most deep UOD models are trained exclusively on clean datasets to learn the …

title: Disentanglement of content and style features in multi-center cytology images via contrastive self-supervised learning
details: C Tian, X Liu, S Cheng, J Bai, L Chen, S Zeng - Biomedical Signal Processing and …, 2024
abstract: Multi-center cervical cytology images have various image styles due to the differences in staining and imaging techniques, which pose a significant challenge to the performance of automated cervical cancer diagnosis tools. We propose a dual …
